scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mustache:build && npm run js:build && npm run css:build && npm run img:build
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/* && mkdir dist/css && mkdir dist/js && mkdir dist/img
scripts.css:build: npm run css:compile && npm run css:autoprefix
scripts.dev: parallelshell 'npm run build' 'npm run watch' 'npm run browsersync'
scripts.mustache:watch: watch 'npm run mustache:build' src/pages src/partials src/data
scripts.js:build: npm run js:head && npm run js:main
scripts.js:head: uglifyjs src/js/head/*.js -o dist/js/head.min.js
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run mustache:watch' 'npm run js:watch' 'npm run css:watch' 'npm run img:watch'
